actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to direct the Chief of the Forest Service to permit certain communities to continue to use the Nicolet National Forest, Wis., for solid waste disposal.

summary.text: Directs the Chief of the Forest Service to permit towns within the Nicolet National Forest to continue to use the Nicolet National Forest, Wisconsin, for solid waste disposal until July 1, 1975.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Chief of the Forest Service to permit certain communities to continue to use the Nicolet National Forest, Wis., for solid waste disposal.
